definition[0]: a small thin piece that is torn or cut roughly from something
example[0]: The clothes were ripped to shreds and covered in blood.
definition[1]: to cut or tear something into small thin pieces
example[2]: Coleslaw is made with shredded cabbage.
definition[2]: to put a document into a shredder
example[3]: Carlson was collecting messages, reading them, then shredding them.
definition[3]: to cut documents into small pieces so that no one can read them
example[4]: Investigators retrieved documents that had been thrown away or shredded.
